abstract: The family of Bob Marley is challenging a deal announced on Tuesday between Verizon and the Universal Music Group to sell ring tones based on the catalog of Marley’s music.
snippet: The family of Bob Marley is challenging a deal announced on Tuesday between Verizon and the Universal Music Group to sell ring tones based on the catalog of Marley’s music.
lead_paragraph: It looked like a public relations coup when, on Tuesday, Verizon Wireless announced that it had signed an exclusive deal with the Universal Music Group to sell its customers ring tones from the catalog of Bob Marley, the famed reggae singer who died in 1981.

headline.main: Family Challenges Verizon Wireless Deal to Sell Bob Marley Ring Tones
headline.print_headline: Family Challenges Verizon Wireless Deal to Sell Bob Marley Ring Tones
